content: As I’ve been away from the product for a few days and I come back to it, some of the choices seem stranger and stranger.

Why do we duplicate an expanded view of group private messages in both the the top left and the bottom right of the screen. Wouldn’t it be better to consolidate or colocate these two views dealing with essentially the same data?
Rishi and I are working hard on fixing this.
(As a sidenote, the answer to that is in part that long-term, we just want the "private messages" one which is newer, but people definitely complain if you try removing the other one)
